captions.text: and we believe we have been "invited"
to this planet to meet our creators because of these cave
Have you guys seen these movies??
Pay no attention to the old man asleep on the other side of the shed.

Okay I know this is amazing but we
are professionals

so let's be extra careful so that we
can get all of the answers we---
I'm pressing every button I can find.
Didn't you bring the map equipment?
Oh my gosh.. I forgot about the maps!

You ugh, you put your finger in that
drink.
David make sure you do not say anything
offensive to the engineer when he wakes.
You guys are the worst team of scientists in the world.
How am I sprinting after having a C-section??
Why are we even running into the shadow of this falling ship??
Hey, what's up? Thanks for watching, hope you enjoyed it.
be sure to subscribe to the channel if ya haven't already and uh..
you know watch some more videos if you feel like it.
Have a  good afternoon or evening...
I don't know what time it is.. I'm from space!

comments.author: Devlyn Nansen

comments.text:
Obviously Ridley didnt want this obvious ending (that we all expected!) so 
this one is funny. Nice job HISE !
Strange theres so many references to the original Alien,but no direct 
logical connections, and then so many new questions inserted. Why do they 
bother "engineering" planets ? Why invite us, why do they need WMD ?  Why 
was the engineer pissed ? Why zenomorph ? Why so many empty spaceships ? 
Too many unresolved issues to make the film satisfying.
Probably just a marketing ploy to allow the franchise to go in any 
direction anyone wants.
Hey, Alien3 got made, this is technically superior and more interesting 
(the AVP direction more fun though).﻿

it possible he woke up and walked back to it with a hole like this in the 
body ?  ( the alien leaving out of him is pretty big )

comments.author: Ultron Janissary

comments.text:
Seeing at the comments section is a battleground for the movie.....
I love this film is because of the ridiculous amounts of biblical and 
mythical allusions (look them up if you have to).  Yes, the film has a 
linear story, and yes that story isn't logical at times; but the film fills 
in those inconsistencies and shouldn't be seen as a Transformers movie 
where you can watch it and be like OKAY GOOD STUFF.  It really is almost 
like a piece of literature that some people will appreciate and wrap their 
heads around while others just either don't like the ideas of don't 
understand them.﻿
comments.author: EliJkFilms

vistas, mkay give u that one. For fuck sake, if you treat it like a black 
comedy it actually makes sense.
